projects.unauthorized: You are not allowed to manage projects.
projects.unauthorized_edit: You are not allowed to edit this project.
projects.twitter_queries_instructions: Manifold will periodically fetch tweets according to the queries specified below.

properties.draft_mode_instructions: A draft project is only visible to users who are able to modify it.
properties.featured_instructions: Featured projects can be automatically included in smart project collections.
properties.finished_instructions: In lists, Manifold will show the publication date for finished projects.
properties.standalone_instructions: If enabled, this project will always render in standalone mode when "?mode=standalone" is appended to the URL. If standalone mode is enforced, this project will always render in standalone mode.
properties.top_bar_text_instructions: If set, the top bar will display and this text will override the installation's top bar text.
properties.top_bar_url_instructions: If the top bar is visible, its text will link to this URL.
properties.disable_public_instructions: When on, this setting will prevent users from commenting or annotating publicly on this project. Reading group annotations will only appear for group members.

access.title: Configure Access Restrictions
access.description: Enable access restrictions and adjust messaging
access.notice_header_placeholder: Access to this project is restricted.
access.notice_body_placeholder: Only users granted permission may view this project's texts, resources, and other content.

exports.instructions: Manifold makes it possible to export a preservation copy of your project to an external export target. To start an export, select one of the configured targets below and press the button. The export will happen in the background and can take a few minutes to complete.
exports.no_targets: No export targets have been created on this instance. Export targets can be managed in the backend under Settings > Export Targets.
exports.no_targets_unauthorized: No export targets have been created on this instance. Only administrators may create export targets. To setup export targets, please contact the administrator of this Manifold instance.

new.layout_instructions: Your project's appearance is modular and highly customizable. The following prompts are to help you get started. If you're unsure of your answers, don't worry, everything can be changed later. Learn more about these Layout options <0>here</0>.
new.title: New Project
new.instructions: Enter the name of your project, and a brief description. Press save to continue.
new.texts_prompt: Will your project include more than one text?
new.texts_instructions: Manifold projects can include a single text or multiple texts.
new.resources_prompt: Do you have resources you want to add in addition to any texts you are loading?
new.resources_instructions: Enhance your texts with media or create a project composed only of media resources.
new.extended_descript_prompt: Do you need additional space to describe your project?
new.extended_descript_instructions: A freeform content block can be used to add text contextualizing your project.
new.activity_instructions: Manifold can showcase the evolution of your project on the platform and in the Twitterverse.

category.title_placeholder: What would you like to call this category?
category.cannot_move_up: Cannot move up. Text is already in the first category.
category.cannot_move_down: Cannot move down. Text is already in the last category.
category.empty_category: No texts have been added to this category
category.uncategorized_tooltip: Uncategorized texts can be hidden in the frontend using this project's Texts content block. If uncategorized texts are visible, they will appear under the heading 'Uncategorized'.

permissions.instructions: Use permissions to specify which users may modify this project in the backend, and the extent to which they can modify it.
permissions.author: Is a project author?
$t(glossary.author_title_case_one)

social.title: New Twitter Query
social.no_tweets: No tweets have been fetched yet.
